scenario_text.value:
The nice and quiet Aoi got all worked up for
my sake.
She even said how much she loves me!

Eheheh... I’m so glad I became friends with
Aoi...

Sure, I’m almost jealous about how close you
guys are.
Aww, you’re my friend too, Takuma!

I’m glad I became friends with Aoi. You too
of course, Takuma!
